2091380.name: Brains n' Bullets
2091380.description:
Brains n' Bullets is a unique shooter game that allows players to improve their school grades while playing. By learning vocabulary and other academic content while fighting with their team on tactical maps to conquer bases, players can have fun while also enhancing their knowledge.


If you want to win here, you not only need skill with your weapon, but also brainpower!

You can only get weapons and ammunition with SmartPoints. For SmartPoints you have to master quests. And masters don't fall from the sky.

So memorize your deck, master the challenges, and outwit your opponent.

Highlights


  • Study for school/university/work while playing a shooter!
  • Experience tactical maps for strategic advance and retreat.
  • Create your own decks to prepare for your next exam.
  • Share decks with friends and play smart together.
  • Download decks from friends to learn faster.
  • Check the learning report in the menu to measure and accelerate your progress
  • Lay smart mines to play a trick on your opponent. If he doesn't give the right answer quickly enough, that's it for him.
2091380.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
